languages.text: "Из Гекатона тогда вернулся каждый десятый, а сейчас в живых остались лишь мы с Вортеном. Мы вернулись без добычи и, считай, без корабля. Все, что я привез оттуда — полный трюм дохлых ксеносов, и эту смертоносную малышку, из которой их вожак успел дважды продырявить мою шкуру".

traits.locale_text: "Из Гекатона тогда вернулся каждый десятый, а сейчас в живых остались лишь мы с Вортеном. Мы вернулись без добычи и, считай, без корабля. Все, что я привез оттуда — полный трюм дохлых ксеносов, и эту смертоносную малышку, из которой их вожак успел дважды продырявить мою шкуру".

languages.text: "Only one in ten made it out of Hecaton, and now it's only me and Worten here. We returned without any loot and virtually without a ship. All I got from that trip was a hold full of dead xenos and this deadly beauty, which their leader used to put two holes in my hide."
languages.original_text: "Из Гекатона тогда вернулся каждый десятый, а сейчас в живых остались лишь мы с Вортеном. Мы вернулись без добычи и, считай, без корабля. Все, что я привез оттуда — полный трюм дохлых ксеносов, и эту смертоносную малышку, из которой их вожак успел дважды продырявить мою шкуру".

traits.locale_text: "Only one in ten made it out of Hecaton, and now it's only me and Worten here We returned without any loot and virtually without a ship. All I got from that trip was a full hold of dead xenos and this deadly beauty, which their leader used to put two holes in my hide."

"Only one in ten made it out of Hecaton, and now it's only me and Worten here We returned without any loot and virtually without a ship. All I got from that trip was a full hold of dead xenos and this deadly beauty, which their leader used to put two holes in my hide."

"Only one in ten made it out of Hecaton, and now it's only me and Worten here. We returned without any loot and virtually without a ship. All I got from that trip was a hold full of dead xenos and this deadly beauty, which their leader used to put two holes in my hide."

"Only one in ten made it out of Hecaton, and now it's only me and Worten here. We returned without any loot and virtually without a ship. All I got from that trip was a hold full of dead xenos and this deadly beauty, which their leader used to put two holes in my hide."

"Only one in ten made it out of Hecaton, and now it's only me and Worten here. We returned without any loot and virtually without a ship. All I got from that trip was a hold full of dead xenos and this deadly beauty, which their leader used to put two holes in my hide."

languages.text: 「ヘカトンから生き延びたのは10人にひとりだけ、今では俺とこのウォルテンだけだ。俺らはなんの戦利品もなく、船のひとつも無いと言ってもいい状態で帰還した。あの旅で得たのは、死んだ異種族の山と、この命を刈り取る美品だけ。奴らのリーダーは、俺の隠れ家に穴ふたつ開けやがった」
languages.original_text: "Only one in ten made it out of Hecaton, and now it's only me and Worten here. We returned without any loot and virtually without a ship. All I got from that trip was a hold full of dead xenos and this deadly beauty, which their leader used to put two holes in my hide."

traits.locale_text: 「ヘカトンから生き延びたのは10人にひとりだけ、今では俺とこのウォルテンだけだ。俺らはなんの戦利品もなく、船のひとつも無いと言ってもいい状態で帰還した。あの旅で得たのは、死んだ異種族の山と、この命を刈り取る美品だけ。奴らのリーダーは、俺の隠れ家に穴ふたつ開けやがった」

languages.text: “到最后，只有十分之一的人逃出了赫卡顿。现在还活着的人，就只剩下我和沃尔腾了。我们什么战利品都没拿回来，甚至连船都差点完蛋。留给我的只有堆积如山的异形尸体，还有这个要命的小美人儿。那群异形的首领用这玩意儿，在我屁股上开了两个窟窿。”
languages.original_text: "Only one in ten made it out of Hecaton, and now it's only me and Worten here. We returned without any loot and virtually without a ship. All I got from that trip was a hold full of dead xenos and this deadly beauty, which their leader used to put two holes in my hide."

traits.locale_text: “到最后，只有十分之一的人逃出了赫卡顿。现在还活着的人，就只剩下我和沃尔腾了。我们什么战利品都没拿回来，甚至连船都差点完蛋。留给我的只有堆积如山的异形尸体，还有这个要命的小美人儿。那群异形的首领用这玩意儿，在我屁股上开了两个窟窿。”

languages.text: «Solo uno de cada diez salimos de Hecaton, y de ellos solo quedamos Worten y yo. Volvimos sin botín y casi sin nave. Lo único que saqué de ese viaje fue una bodega llena de xenos muertos y esta preciosidad con la que su líder me hizo dos agujeros».
languages.original_text: "Only one in ten made it out of Hecaton, and now it's only me and Worten here. We returned without any loot and virtually without a ship. All I got from that trip was a hold full of dead xenos and this deadly beauty, which their leader used to put two holes in my hide."

traits.locale_text: «Solo uno de cada diez salimos de Hecaton, y de ellos solo quedamos Worten y yo. Volvimos sin botín y casi sin nave. Lo único que saqué de ese viaje fue una bodega llena de xenos muertos y esta preciosidad con la que su líder me hizo dos agujeros».

languages.text: « Seul un homme sur dix est sorti vivant de cette bataille, et aujourd'hui, il ne reste plus que moi et Worten ici présent. Nous sommes rentrés sans butin et presque sans vaisseau. Tout ce que nous avons récolté de ce voyage, c'est une cale pleine de cadavres de xénos et cette beauté fatale qui m'a troué la peau par deux fois entre les mains de leur chef. »
languages.original_text: "Only one in ten made it out of Hecaton, and now it's only me and Worten here. We returned without any loot and virtually without a ship. All I got from that trip was a hold full of dead xenos and this deadly beauty, which their leader used to put two holes in my hide."

traits.locale_text: « Seul un homme sur dix est sorti vivant de cette bataille, et aujourd'hui, il ne reste plus que moi et Worten ici présent. Nous sommes rentrés sans butin et presque sans vaisseau. Tout ce que nous avons récolté de ce voyage, c'est une cale pleine de cadavres de xénos et cette beauté fatale qui m'a troué la peau par deux fois entre les mains de leur chef. »

languages.text: "Nur einer von zehn hat Hecaton wieder verlassen, und jetzt sind nur noch ich und Worten hier übrig. Wir kehrten ohne Beute und praktisch auch ohne Schiff zurück. Geblieben ist mir von der Reise nur eine Ladung toter Xenos und diese tödliche Schönheit, mit der ihr Anführer mir zwei Löcher in den Pelz gebrannt hat."
languages.original_text: "Only one in ten made it out of Hecaton, and now it's only me and Worten here. We returned without any loot and virtually without a ship. All I got from that trip was a hold full of dead xenos and this deadly beauty, which their leader used to put two holes in my hide."

traits.locale_text: "Nur einer von zehn hat Hecaton wieder verlassen, und jetzt sind nur noch ich und Worten hier übrig. Wir kehrten ohne Beute und praktisch auch ohne Schiff zurück. Geblieben ist mir von der Reise nur eine Ladung toter Xenos und diese tödliche Schönheit, mit der ihr Anführer mir zwei Löcher in den Pelz gebrannt hat."

languages.text: "Hecaton'a giden her on kişiden sadece biri sağ kurtuldu, sadece Worten'le ikimiz yıllara dayanabildik. Elimiz boş, yıkık bir gemiyle döndük. O yolculuktan yadigâr, ölü bir zeno ile liderlerinin vücudumda iki delik açtığı bu ölümcül güzellik kaldı."
languages.original_text: "Only one in ten made it out of Hecaton, and now it's only me and Worten here. We returned without any loot and virtually without a ship. All I got from that trip was a hold full of dead xenos and this deadly beauty, which their leader used to put two holes in my hide."

traits.locale_text: "Hecaton'a giden her on kişiden sadece biri kurtuldu, yıllara ise sadece Worten ile ikimiz dayanabildik. Elimiz boş, yıkık bir gemiyle döndük. O yolculuktan yadigâr ölü bir zeno ve liderlerinin bedenime iki delik açtığı bu ölümcül güzellik kaldı elimde."
